body_html:
I ran into a similar problem building makefiles from macos and I solved a similar error using this:

make -f tensorflow/contrib/makefile/Makefile HOST_LDOPTS=tensorflow/contrib/makefile/downloads/nsync/builds/default.macos.c++11/nsync.a
body_text:
I ran into a similar problem building makefiles from macos and I solved a similar error using this:
make -f tensorflow/contrib/makefile/Makefile HOST_LDOPTS=tensorflow/contrib/makefile/downloads/nsync/builds/default.macos.c++11/nsync.a
body:
I ran into a similar problem building makefiles from **macos** and I solved a similar error using this:

```
make -f tensorflow/contrib/makefile/Makefile HOST_LDOPTS=tensorflow/contrib/makefile/downloads/nsync/builds/default.macos.c++11/nsync.a
```
